org.sensorhub.impl.service.wsn

Interface ISubscriptionDB

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemorySubscriptionDB

    public interface ISubscriptionDB

    Interface for a WSN subscription database

    Since:
    Dec 12, 2014
    Author:
    Alex Robin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkSubscription(SubscriptionInfo sub)
      Checks that the suscription is valid for the particular application For example if a topic is specified it should be one of the topics advertised by the notification service
      String generateNewSubscriptionID()
      Generates a new unique ID for a new subscription
      SubscriptionInfo get(String id)
      Retrieves subscription by ID from database
      Collection<SubscriptionInfo> getAllSubscriptions()
      Gets all subscriptions in this database
      List<SubscriptionInfo> getUserSubscriptions(String userID)
      Retrieves the list of all subscriptions associated to a given user ID
      void put(SubscriptionInfo sub)
      Adds the subscription to the database
      SubscriptionInfo remove(String id)
      Removed subscription with given ID from database

    • Method Detail

      • get

        SubscriptionInfo get(String id)
        Retrieves subscription by ID from database
        Parameters:
        id - ID of subscription to retrieve
        Returns:
        subscription with specified ID or null if none was found with given ID

      • put

        void put(SubscriptionInfo sub)
        Adds the subscription to the database
        Parameters:
        sub - new subscription

      • remove

        SubscriptionInfo remove(String id)
        Removed subscription with given ID from database
        Parameters:
        id - ID of subscription to remove
        Returns:
        removed subscription or null if none was found with given ID

      • getAllSubscriptions

        Collection<SubscriptionInfo> getAllSubscriptions()
        Gets all subscriptions in this database
        Returns:
        all subscriptions as a collection

      • getUserSubscriptions

        List<SubscriptionInfo> getUserSubscriptions(String userID)
        Retrieves the list of all subscriptions associated to a given user ID
        Parameters:
        userID -
        Returns:
        subscription list, empty list if the user has no subscriptions attached or null if user ID does not exist

      • checkSubscription

        void checkSubscription(SubscriptionInfo sub)
                       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Checks that the suscription is valid for the particular application For example if a topic is specified it should be one of the topics advertised by the notification service
        Parameters:
        sub -
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the subscription is not valid with the appropriate message

      • generateNewSubscriptionID

        String generateNewSubscriptionID()
        Generates a new unique ID for a new subscription
        Returns:
        generated ID
